
# HRS 2016 and participant subgroups 

The following diagram summarizes the relationships among some important subgroups of participants for this analysis.

::: {.callout-warning}
## Sampling Weight Issue

There are 79 people in HCAP who have a zero sampling weight in the HRS 2016 (`PWGT`). They are included as being in the sampling frame for this analysis.
